author: Luc Olinga
title: Trump Media Is Now a $2 Billion Bitcoin Bet
description: The company behind Truth Social is converting its cash into crypto, creating a high-stakes link between its future and the volatile digital currency.
content:
Trump Media isnt just fighting Big Tech. Its taking on Wall Street with a Bitcoin war chest big enough to rival corporate heavyweights.
